favourite.article: Prod me with Your loving hand oh Lord Jesus, Amen.
Amen, Lift me up with Your mighty hand.
I still remember my first time singing this song at the Winter Getaway last year. Set my eyes only on You Lord!
And earthly desires I bid goodbye And set my eyes on You!
O Lord, prod me with Your loving hands, stir me from my deep impasse. Lift me up with Your mighty hand.
Lord, I set my eyes on You. :)
Lord set our eyes on you away from this corrupted age! Set us on the narrow path!

Amen! Oh Lord... this song is so applicable to my current walk with the Lord. Lord, thank You for this song and for reminding me that I need to ask You to put me on the mount so that I can realize just how vain and unsatisfactory my earthly desires and pleasures are. Praise our precious Christ!
Memorable song to me!!!!
Amen!!!! Oh Tuhan Yesus. Halleluya!
Amen. I was refreshed with my consecration in this song.
Amen, Oh Lord Jesus!! Thank You for everything. Prod me with Your loving hands. Stir me from my deep impasse.
Amen. Lift me up Lord with Your mighty hands. Lord Jesus I love You.
PRAISE THE LORD! LIFT ME UP WITH YOUR MIGHTY HAND. AMEN!
PTL I love this song very much.
Oh God! thank You. God has shown me the ugliness of this world and His love for me.
We must daily exercise the word of God.
Amen. We must leave the world and set our eyes to God. Amen. We must love Him and we must offer our life by serving Him as our Bridegroom in our wedding with Him. AMEN!!!!!!!!!!!!
Lord, thank you for this. Anytime that I hear it You remind me that the world is vanity of vanities. Lift me up Your mighty hand. Set me on the mount to see what the world offer me. Lord Jesus...
I love the song. Thank You Lord. Lift me up with Your mighty hand above this frenzied land.
Amen, praise the Lord.

Lord Jesus, Thank you for Your firm word. I trust in You "And I give to them eternal life, and they shall by no means perish forever, and no one shall snatch them out of My hand" I feel very much encouraged singing this song!
We sang this song at the Young Working Saints' Retreat and enjoyed it so much!
Lift me up with Your mighty hand, LORD!!!
I like this song. Every time I hear more and love Him more. I feel very much encouraged.

Praise the Lord! What an awakening song! This remind us that all earthly things are vanity, dung before the eyes of God. Oh Lord Jesus! Capture us with Your beauty! Renew our consecration before You, that we may walk Your ordained way. Hallelujah! Amen. :)

Lord, save and lift me up with Your mighty hands from all vanities in this land and bring me into Mount Zion to have a clear vision regarding Your economy. I love this song and I remembered the summer camp of the YOUNG PEOPLE in Zamboanga del sur and Sibuguy. Yes, Lord continue to preserve me. I love the YP, children and all the saints. Please extend my life use me for more years. I LOVE YOU LORD JESUS and Your church. Hallellujah!!!
Lord set us on the highest mountain for us to see the vanity of the world and see a clear vision concerning Your economy. Amen.
Amen.
Hallelujah! I love this hymn.
We usually sing this on our young people's meeting.The yp enjoyed it very much.
Praise the Lord!! Nothing is sweeter than the Lord's presence. Everything is only vanity without Him.
Lord, lift me up to a higher ground, to see the world is vain, only Christ is gain. Lord, lift me up high above the clouds, where the Lord alone is seen, His voice we hear. Lord, You are our all.
Lord Jesus, thank You for giving us this opportunity to enjoy You in a higher view. we praise You, O Lord.

I'm so glad that the Lord continue to preserve us, since I missed the saints in Oroquieta especially the meetings. Praise the Lord that the Lord always lifts His mighty hand for us to be away from the world and show us how vanity it is. Oh Lord Jesus I love You!
Amen. Praise the Lord that God has called us for His purpose.
Amen, Amen. Thanks be to God, for He gives us a higher view concerning His eternal economy.
Lord Jesus we thank You for giving us a view of what the world really is. May we always set our eyes on You only Lord, for everything in this world is vanity.

When I heard this song, it reminded me of the first time it was introduced by Jeff O'yek and Marlon Chua to QC, Philippines saints. Sweet, Sweet fellowship. Hallelujah for the Lord! Miss the fellowship there.
AMEN. This is the first song that my cousin learned from me (with action of course) I like this so much.
Praise the LORD saints! HE is incomparable! He is our all! All things are just vain compared to Him. Amen! Amen! Amen!
I love this song because it shows us how much the world can offer us, but it's nothing compared to what the Lord is to us. We need to have this vision that turns us towards the Lord!

There are times the world seems to offer me so many attractions. But Lord, set me on the mount to see that whatever the world offers are just "dung". How wonderful that we are the faith people, of whom the corrupted world is not worthy. Only the holy city of God, New Jerusalem, is worthy to have us. Hallelujah! (Heb. 11:38 fn 1)
Thank God for giving us a higher view. We'll all be dead to the world, biding goodbye to all that the world offers. God, I love You.

Oh Lord, thank You for this higher view. May I finally bid goodbye to this world. May all the saints especially the young people see the world as a waste and nothing... and come make business with the Lord!

I just recently came back from my first high school retreat, and now this song has so much more meaning... the Lord really lifted me up, and showed me that nothing on this earth is worth wasting our time on. Lord now I can genuinely say that "earthly desires I bid goodbye, and set my eyes on You"! Lord Jesus I love You!

I really love to sing this song. It reminds me when I was captured by the Lord in the young people's meeting in the Philippines. How I love the Lord so much. Lord! I love You till Your coming back. Amen!
I really love this song. LORD, I LOVE YOU SO MUCH...
set my eyes just on You Lord, world is nothing, my all is for Your economy. my glorious Bridegroom, come soon... come soon.. hallelujah...
Every time I hear this song all my problems are gone because our Lord Jesus Christ is always guide us to the right way. Oh Lord Jesus! Hallelujah! ptl! Amen.
Amen! Praise the Lord! I bid goodbye to the world and set my eyes on You, Lord!

Oh Lord Jesus! We just need to turn to You no matter what the world can give to us because it's just vanity and it doesn't give us the real joy. Our real Joy is You Lord. This song reminds me of the young people in Southern Philippines. I missed singing this with them with an overflowing heart fully consecrated to the Lord.
Yes, Lord. Set me on the mount to see that besides You everything is just a vanity. I just want to set my eyes on YOU.
Amen. Walk in the line of life.
Amen!!! Praise the Lord...

Yes, I love to hear this song because it is really an encouraging song. It also reminds me of the joyful togetherness with the young people in the church in Pagadian City, my hometown. I miss you all there saints!!! Amen.

"Set me on the mount to see What the world can offer me; Till I see the vanity from on high And earthly desires I bid goodbye And set my eyes on You."
Lord I bid goodbye. I set my eyes on You. Set me as a seal on Your arm and as a seal on you heart. My heart and my flesh fail, but You are my portion forever!

Set me on the mount to see What the world can offer me; Till I see the vanity from on high And earthly desires I bid goodbye And set my eyes on You.
I gain nothing from the world, why I should follow their steps? May I have a pure heart that come to love God and always sacrifice myself to His eternal economy.
Nothing can satisfies us in this world. All things are vanity of all vanities.

It is the same, but in Ukainian: Любляча рука Твоя Хай веде мене, бо я Лишити мушу згубний шлях, Та дух мертвить душа моя, Це виллє на мене гнів Твій. Тож дай мені вузький шлях Свій, І хоч цей шлях крізь терен іде, Та в взаємну він оселю нас веде.
Тож міцною рукою Ти Мене над землею здійми. Згори подивлюсь, мені Дати може що цей світ. Я побачу марноту з вишини, Бажанням скажу: прощавай, земним І дивлюсь лиш на Тебе.
praise the LORD!!... For nothing in this world can offer me; but You, CHRIST my Beloved!!
I really, really , really ...been enjoying this hymnal both from my work and when being alone...Oh Lord, lift me up, and bring me into a higher experience of you!!!
it brings be higher into the throne of God as He prods and lifts me up with His might hands. I'm so glad to know that my fellow brothers & sisters are enjoying the same grace of God with this song.
......praise he lord..!!!!oh lord jesus lift me up, prod me with ur loving hands and guide me lord jesus to be a vial saints in ur economy..
What the world can offer me?...NOTHING! Just pursue and gain Christ!
Lord, lift us up into the mountain that we may see the vision of Your economy! Lord, we just want to see and look away unto You!
My Lord knows how I easily backslide from His dear presence. How I need Him to prod me with His loving hand, that I may turn away from everything else unto Jesus!

"Prod me with Your loving hands... Stir me from my deep impasse... Lift me up with Your mighty hand..." Lord, You know my condition. Only You can save and lift me away from the world. Lift me higher and higher in my experience of You. Even make my eyes clear enough to see all the world's vanity...Just set my eyes on You.
Hallelujah! Amen!!!
Amen! I really love this song. The more I sing this song, the more I love the Lord and the church. HALLELUJAH!
I like this song because it reminds me to consecrate myself to the Lord.
I like this song because it shows me see the thing that before I never thought.
Why I like this song? Because it is the most encouraging song I ever encounter before I was a believer in Christ...
I like this song because when every time I heard this it's cause me to love the Lord and experience Christ through hymn that's why I love this song.
